itemDescription: Scottish lawyer 1759-1851), served as Lord Provost of Glasgow 1833 to 1834.

wikipedia_page.main: Robert Grahame of Whitehill (1759–1851) was an 18th/19th century Scottish lawyer who served as Lord Provost of Glasgow 1833 to 1834.

response: His daughter Hannah Finlay married Thomas Grahame second son of Robert Grahame of Whitehill, Lord Provost of Glasgow 1833/4.http://www.glasgowwestaddress.co.uk/Old_Country_Houses/Whitehill_House.htm
